  • Method Details

    • scroll

      public static void scroll(JComponent c, int part, int[] opts)
      Scroll to specified location. e.g. scroll(component, BOTTOM).
      Parameters:
      c - JComponent to scroll.
      part - Location to scroll to. Should be a bit-wise OR of one or moe of the values: NONE, TOP, VCENTER, BOTTOM, LEFT, HCENTER, RIGHT.
      opts - the opts

    • scroll

      public static void scroll(JComponent c, int horizontal, int vertical, int[] opts)
      Scroll to specified location. e.g.scroll(component, LEFT, BOTTOM);
      Parameters:
      c - JComponent to scroll.
      horizontal - Horizontal location. Should take the value: LEFT, HCENTER or RIGHT.
      vertical - Vertical location. Should take the value: TOP, VCENTER or BOTTOM.
      opts - the opts
